metadata.synopsis:
This victim was cursed to see the future by the hag. In his initial dialogue, he is SEVERELY traumatised - sitting down, knees up, peeking out between his arms. He should sound quite disturbed, as if his sanity has long since deserted him.

He doesn't look at the player until halfway through the dialogue. When he looks up, he believes the player to be a monster of nightmares - a mindflayer. This is a terrifying moment for the player, as they are fighting a parasite in their head that will cause them to turn into a mindflayer.

In his dialogue in which he's met the player but has survived the hag, his gift is gone - but once he realises the player is the monster he saw before, he runs - terrified. 

In his post hag dialogue he is saddened and clearly traumatised by his time with the hag - and the thought of the life he could have led.

29.speaker: Lorin
29.context: NodeContext: Player has spoken to you once already. Fighting back tears - panicked and afraid - wishing these visions of death would end.

34.speaker: Lorin
34.text: No... No. Don't look. Musn'tlook. Musn'tsee.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sitting on the ground, knees up, hands moving from across knees to face as you rocking back and forth, severely traumatised and trying to hide from the worldNodeContext: Opening line of the dialogue. This is quite a disturbing scene - you're clearly traumatised but trying to hold it together initially. Speaking and muttering to yourself (the image you are trying not too look at is your own corpse - rotten and broken), You are not looking at the player.

64.speaker: Player
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Shot of mirror.  His reflection stares back.|NodeContext: Quickly muttered - not looking at player.

40.speaker: Lorin
40.text: I see it - what's to come.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Shot of mirror.  His reflection stares back.|NodeContext: Quickly muttered - not looking at player.

47.context: NodeContext: Quickly muttered - not looking at player. Traumatised.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: *You realise there's magic at work. Some type of spell - an illusion.*
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Points at the mirror. Shot of mirror. The player only sees this NPCs reflection staring back.NodeContext: You're starting to panic. You see your corpse in the mirror - dead, rotten and still siitting there - forever in the clutches of the hag.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: What are you doing? Get out of here.
43.context: NodeContext: You've been ordered by the hag to sit in place - forever staring at your own death in the mirror. This is the key moment of the dialogue. You finally raise you head and turn - looking up a the player. Your speech breaks off as you see a hideous monster - the stuff of nightmares.

12.speaker: Lorin
12.text: Ethel said. Said to look. Tosee. Seetruth. Seedeath. See -

You finally raise you head and turn - looking up a the player. Your speech breaks off as you see a hideous monster - the stuff of nightmares.

22.speaker: Player

53.speaker: Lorin
53.text: Ah! Gods! Don't hurt me. Oh, please, please pleasepleaseplease.
53.context: NodeContext: Terrified, begging and pleading. You see the player as one of the most terrifying monster in the world. You're freaking out - eyes wide and fixed on the player - hand out begging them not to hurt you.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: What? Why would I hurt you?
10.context: NodeContext: Player hasn't yet realised you're talking about them. Horror mounting in your voice - you're about to have a complete and totaly terrified and hysterical breakdown.

11.context: NodeContext: Player hasn't yet realised you're talking about them. Horror mounting in your voice - you're about to have a complete and totaly terrified and hysterical breakdown.

37.speaker: Lorin

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Look at me - I'm not a mind flayer.
24.context: NodeContext: Player has tried to reassure you. You curl up - hiding as much of your body with your hands as you can as you descend into a terrified and jibbering mess.
